mapper.select: SELECT A.PROD_QTY, B.PLAN_QTY, B.SHIFTID FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ WHERE B.WORK_DATE=CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATE, #{workDate}), 112) AND A.ISUSABLE ='USABLE' AND B.ISUSABLE ='USABLE' AND B.FACTORYID =#{factoryid} AND B.LINEID=#{lineid}
